actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The wind demon makes two frost claw attacks.

actions.name: Frost Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

special_abilities.name: Arrow Bane
special_abilities.desc: When the wind demon is targeted by an attack or spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a d6. On a 1 to 5, the attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll. On a 6, the wind demon is unaffected, and the attack is reflected back at the attacker as though it originated from the wind demon, turning the attacker into the target.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The wind demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
